headline: Autodesk launches freemium access to Autodesk Flow Studio, with new pricing tiers making world-class VFX AI more affordable to all creators
summary: Today at SIGGRAPH 2025, Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADSK) launched new, more affordable pricing for Autodesk Flow Studio (formerly Wonder Studio) including its first free tier and a 50% price drop for the Lite plan – from $20 to $10 – a significant move to make the toolset more accessible. By removing up-front costs so artists can use premium artificial intelligence (AI) powered 3D tools to create the kind of animation and VFX once reserved for Hollywood, Autodesk is signaling a new era of AI within

headline: Nova Shares Jump 4% on Q2 Earnings Beat, Robust Q3 Guidance
summary: NVMI shares rise as second-quarter earnings and revenues beat estimates, with upbeat Q3 guidance fueling investor optimism.

headline: Cleanspark Share Price Dips 8% Despite Strong Q3 Earnings Growth
summary: CLSK shares plunge 8% despite fiscal third-quarter earnings swinging to profit and revenue surging nearly 91% year over year.
